properties.areaDesc: Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Monroe; Southeast Carter; Blount Smoky Mountains; Unicoi; Johnson; Southeast Greene; Cocke Smoky Mountains
properties.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 9 at 9:01PM EST until January 11 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, south winds of 20 to 30 mph with
gusts up to 55 mph. For the High Wind Watch, south winds 25 to
40 mph with gusts in excess of 70 mph possible.

* WHERE...Far east Tennessee Mountains and Adjacent Foothills.

* WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 7 AM EST Friday. For the
High Wind Watch, from Friday evening through Saturday evening.

* IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines.
Isolated power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult,
especially for high profile vehicles.
properties.instruction:
Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this
situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe
location prior to the onset of winds.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING
